data.lyric:

[00:00.00]Bang! - AJR
[00:02.20]Lyrics by：Ryan Met/Jack Met/Adam Met
[00:04.41]Composed by：Ryan Met/Jack Met/Adam Met
[00:06.62]I get up I get down and I'm jumpin' around
[00:10.16]And the rumpus and ruckus are comfortable now
[00:13.62]Been a hell of a ride but I'm thinking it's time to grow
[00:18.44]bang bang bang
[00:20.34]So I got an apartment across from the park
[00:23.66]Put quinoa in my fridge still I'm not feeling grown
[00:27.35]Been a hell of a ride but I'm thinking it's time to go
[00:31.44]Bang bang bang
[00:33.36]Here we go
[00:34.41]So put your best face on everybody
[00:37.92]Pretend you know this song everybody
[00:41.10]Come hang let's go out with a bang
[00:45.90]Bang bang bang
[00:47.90]I'm way too young to lie here forever
[00:51.42]I'm way too old to try so whatever
[00:54.81]Come hang let's go out with a bang
[00:59.56]Bang bang bang
[01:01.50]Feel like I'm gonna puke 'cause my taxes are due
[01:04.94]Do my password begin with a one or a two
[01:08.52]Been a hell of a ride but I'm thinking it's time to grow
[01:13.25]Bang bang bang
[01:14.79]Metronome
[01:15.44]Man I'm up to something
[01:16.76]Up to something
[01:17.57]Ooh-de-la-di-do thank you all for coming
[01:20.14]All for coming
[01:20.76]I hope you like the show 'cause it's on a budget
[01:23.55]On a budget

[01:32.52]Pretend you know this song everybody

[01:46.22]I'm way too old to try so whatever

[01:54.42]Bang bang bang
[01:55.67]Bang bang-bang-bang-bang
[01:57.76]Bang bang bang
[01:59.08]Bang bang-bang-bang-bang bang
[02:00.12]Been a hell of a ride but I'm thinking it's time to go
[02:06.81]So put your best face on everybody

[ar:AJR]
[al:Bang!]
[by:]

[00:02.20]//

[00:06.62]我坐立不安 我四处蹿跳
[00:10.16]如今我觉得喧嚣嘈杂都悦耳动听
[00:13.62]历经坎坷 我觉得是时候长大了
[00:18.44]尽情狂欢 纵享欢乐
[00:20.34]我在公园对面租了一套公寓
[00:23.66]我把藜麦放进冰箱里 我觉得我还是懵懂少年
[00:27.35]历经坎坷 我想是时候启程
[00:31.44]尽情狂欢 纵享欢乐
[00:33.36]我们即刻开始
[00:34.41]各位 请露出你们的笑颜
